Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-12243 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.7.11-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-12243 affecting package gnutls for versions less than 3.7.11-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gnutls is earlier than 3.7.11-3, affected by CVE-2024-12243
